channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Dynamics Sure Step on 0x000216

item.title: Arising from the Depths of the Curriculum Cave
item.description:
My apologies for being absent from this blog for the past six weeks. I’ve been busy updating training materials for the Microsoft Dynamics Sure Step 2010 release. My focus has been on the “Project Managing Microsoft Dynamics Implementations with Microsoft Dynamics Sure Step” course (80199), which utilizes a case study approach for collaborative learning. Participants work through a fictional company implementation, applying Sure Step tools, templates, and guidance. I’ve taught earlier versions of this course and witnessed how it transforms students’ understanding of Sure Step, shifting from theoretical knowledge to practical application...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/arising-from-the-depths-of-the-curriculum-cave/

item.title: Caution: Implementation Trauma Upcoming
item.description:
I’m currently in Indianapolis for work and, despite a looming deadline for my blog post, I’m feeling a bit short on inspiration. It could be the post-holiday slump, or maybe it’s because I’m prepping for a training session tomorrow. Either way, I’m hoping my readers will bear with me! I’ve been doing a lot of training and study hall sessions for Microsoft Dynamics Sure Step lately, and it’s made me reflect on some common pitfalls I’ve encountered during implementations...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/caution-implementation-trauma-upcoming/

item.title: Are you Sure Step Certified, or just Certifiable?
item.description:
I came across a helpful blog post by a European Sure Step trainer that offers valuable advice for those preparing for the Sure Step exam. I recommend reading the comments too, as they address common concerns about Sure Step that I often hear. While Sure Step offers a wide range of tools, it’s crucial to remember that improvement is a gradual process. Focus on identifying areas within your organization that need enhancement, and then leverage the Sure Step guidance to address those specific areas...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/are-you-sure-step-certified-or-just-certifiable/

item.title: Are you feeling overwhelmed by the prospect of managing Microsoft Dynamics implementations? Don't worry, we've got you covered.
item.description:
Hey Partners! Still need to conquer the Managing Microsoft Dynamics Implementations exam? Stop delaying and join me for a virtual study session on March 25th! Here’s a sneak peek at what we’ll cover: Get ready for the Managing Microsoft Dynamics Implementation exam (MB5-858) with our helpful study session. We’ll go over essential concepts, examine the exam prep guide, and connect relevant Sure Step elements to sharpen your study approach. Register here:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/are-you-feeling-overwhelmed-by-the-prospect-of-managing-microsoft-dynamics-implementations-don-t-worry-we-ve-got-you-covered/

item.title: Debunking Myths About the Sure Step
item.description:
For the past few years, I’ve been teaching the Microsoft Dynamics Sure Step curriculum. My classes have been the fullest they’ve ever been in recent months due to the changes in the partner program. It’s great to hear about the various experiences of Dynamics partners (AX, CRM, GP, NAV, SL). Contrary to what many people think, it’s not just the “big” partners who have benefited from using Sure Step in their businesses...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/debunking-myths-about-the-sure-step/

item.title: Study Hall Fun at Sure Step!
item.description:
Microsoft Partners, if you’re aiming to achieve the Implementation Methodology certification before the May 1st deadline, consider attending the Sure Step Study Hall at Convergence. Sunday, April 10, 2011 3:15 PM Room B216, Georgia World Congress Center (Convention Center) This session provides valuable advice on building an effective study plan for exam success. We’ll explore essential Sure Step concepts and highlight helpful tools and guidance within Sure Step to optimize your study efforts...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/study-hall-fun-at-sure-step/
